Players will have a level cap of 12 and the total Class level of both classes cannot exceed this, meaning that you may not be able to reach the full potential of either class you are multiclassing. In addition, you may find that not all Classes will synergize with each other and may find yourself weaker than if you were to focus on a single Class.
